Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indonesian national team will have to take advantage of this match against the Vietnam national team to take a breakthrough and raise their collective soccer towards their attempt to qualify for the knockout stages of the 2024 Asian Cup of Nations.
Indonesia also faces a very strict group, but with a real and high possibility of qualifying to the next stage of this tournament.
Others: Vietnam and Indonesia have met on a total of 27 occasions (8 wins for Vietnam, 11 draws, 8 wins for Indonesia) where the scales are all square. In goal scoring history, Vietnam has the edge with 34 goals scored to Indonesia's 31. Their last duel dates back to an international friendly in January 2023 where Vietnam beat Indonesia 2-0.
